Actionable_Takeaway.example: Try this 3-step framework: (1) identify repetitive tasks, (2) build small prompts, (3) measure time saved.

Actionable_Takeaway.template: Start today: [practical task] — report back in X days.
Actionable_Takeaway.example: Start today: use a 10-minute daily prompt to summarize your inbox — report back in 7 days.

Role_Targeted_Recommendation.example: If you're a PM, replace one weekly meeting with a 30-minute AI-assisted plan review.
For marketers: test one AI-generated subject line per campaign this month.

Credibility_Micro_Proof.template: As someone who [experience], I found [insight]. Try [action].
Credibility_Micro_Proof.example: As someone who built automations, I found small prompts compound — automate one report this week.

Credibility_Micro_Proof.template: We tested [method] and saw [metric]. You can try it too: [how-to].
Credibility_Micro_Proof.example: We tested prompt-chaining and cut time by 30% — try chaining two prompts for your next report.

Call_to_Engagement.template: What do you think — threat or opportunity?
Call_to_Engagement.example: AI for knowledge workers: threat or opportunity?
Tried ChatGPT for drafting client emails — what happened for you?

Impact_Scenario.template: If this scales, what happens to [role/industry]?
Impact_Scenario.example: If this scales, what happens to entry-level research roles?

Impact_Scenario.template: This could change [metric/outcome] — how will you adapt?
Impact_Scenario.example: This could cut reporting time in half — how will you redeploy that time?

Short_Do_This_Now.example: Do this now: ask ChatGPT to summarize your last 3 meeting notes and compare time saved.
Bookmark & try: a daily 10-min prompt for meeting prep.

Social_Proof_Trend.template: Others are doing this — here’s a quick example.
Social_Proof_Trend.example: Other teams use prompt templates to speed up hiring comms — copy one today.

Social_Proof_Trend.template: Research shows [key stat]. That matters because [impact].
Social_Proof_Trend.example: Research: 30% of consumer ChatGPT use is work-related. That matters — it’s now part of the productivity stack.

Hybrid_Endings.template: [Actionable tip]. What would you try first?
Hybrid_Endings.example: Create one prompt for your most recurring task. What would you try first?

Hybrid_Endings.template: [Short insight]. If you wanted to test this, how would you measure success?
Hybrid_Endings.example: AI can take over admin tasks. If you test this, how will you measure success?

Safety_Ethics.template: This is exciting — but watch for [risk]. How would you mitigate it?
Safety_Ethics.example: Exciting — but watch for data leakage. How would you mitigate it?
Before you adopt, ensure you anonymize sensitive inputs.

Next_Step_Resource.template: If you want, I can share my [resource/checklist]. Say 'yes' in the comments.
Next_Step_Resource.example: If you want, I can share my 5-prompt starter pack. Say 'yes' in the comments.

Next_Step_Resource.template: Want a template? DM me 'template' and I’ll send one.
Next_Step_Resource.example: Want a ChatGPT prompt template for status updates? DM me 'template' and I’ll send it.
